decks.notes: This deck focuses on utilizing Lotus Field to generate a large amount of mana quickly in order to cast powerful spells like Emergent Ultimatum and Omniscience. It also includes cards like Vizier of Tumbling Sands and Hidden Strings to untap Lotus Field and maximize its potential. The deck includes various lands to support the combo pieces, along with cards like Bala Ged Recovery and Dark Petition to search for essential pieces. The goal is to assemble the combo pieces and overwhelm the opponent with powerful spells and abilities.

This Jund aggro deck focuses on sacrificing creatures for value while dealing direct damage to your opponent. By combining cards like Witch's Oven, Cauldron Familiar, and Mayhem Devil, the deck creates a synergistic loop that can quickly overwhelm your opponent. Utilizing removal spells like Fatal Push and Deadly Dispute helps to control the board while cards like Scavenger's Talent offer card advantage. Yagra, Eater of All provides a powerful finisher, while Bloodtithe Harvester can help gain life to stay in the game. Overall, this deck aims to pressure the opponent and close out the game quickly.

The Selesnya Aggro deck focuses on quickly deploying creatures and disrupting opponents with removal spells while building a strong board presence. By efficiently utilizing mana dorks like Llanowar Elves and Elvish Mystic, the deck can quickly ramp into powerful threats like Bishop of Wings and Righteous Valkyrie. Collected Company allows for explosive creature plays, while cards like Skyclave Apparition provide removal options. The deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a mix of aggressive creatures and disruptive spells, capitalizing on tempo advantages to close out games efficiently.

The main focus of this deck is to utilize fast, aggressive creatures and burn spells to deal damage to the opponent quickly. With a combination of efficient creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Soul-Scar Mage, as well as versatile burn spells such as Lightning Helix and Skewer the Critics, this deck aims to apply pressure early and maintain it throughout the game. The inclusion of Jegantha, the Wellspring as a Companion adds an extra layer of consistency and versatility to the deck's strategy. Overall, the key concept is to overwhelm the opponent with a relentless assault of creatures and burn spells.

The focus of this deck is to aggressively build up devotion to green mana symbols on the battlefield, utilizing cards like Cavalier of Thorns and Kiora, Behemoth Beckoner to ramp up mana production. This allows for powerful plays such as casting Storm the Festival to bring out multiple threats at once. With a strong core of green creatures like Old-Growth Troll and Polukranos Reborn, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent quickly with efficient and powerful creatures while utilizing key lands like Nykthos, Shrine to Nyx for additional mana advantage.

The deck relies on combining Enigmatic Incarnation and Fires of Invention to have strong control over the game. Using Fable of the Mirror-Breaker to search for specific creatures and spells, the deck aims to control the board with cards like Leyline Binding and Chained to the Rocks. The inclusion of powerful creatures like Atraxa, Grand Unifier and Elesh Norn, Mother of Machines, along with removal spells like Portable Hole and Skyclave Apparition, provides a versatile approach to the game. Overall, the deck focuses on control through strategic card plays and powerful creatures.

This Rakdos Aggro deck focuses on playing low-cost creatures and quickly dealing damage to the opponent. The deck includes cards that provide additional power or abilities to your creatures, as well as direct damage spells to finish off the opponent. The companion Jegantha, the Wellspring adds an extra element to the deck, making it more versatile and powerful. By utilizing aggressive creatures and efficient spells, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and win the game through fast and relentless attacks.
